column2: "You saw it just now? You saw it, right? Yes! There's no mistaking it!"
"My camera and memory are working normally, something was definitely there!"
"That's great! If you saw it too, then it was really there."
"It was a small shadow, or maybe a small person?"
"I wasn't able to talk or say thanks, but that's okay."
"At least I know for sure. And that's more than enough for now."
"From here, it's just a matter of perseverance and patience! Both of which I have confidence in!"
